description: Non material amendment to planning permission P091301 dated 20 April 2010 to amend the heights of the planters located along the boundary shared with the Compton Terrace properties, to the north of the application site, adjacent to the raised first floor community garden. The change in height is a 170mm change in the eastern part of the site and a 560mm increase in height for the six western most planters.
decision_conditions: INFORMATIVE: the cross sections provided are not referenced to the first floor plan for the site. The only truly useful drawing therefore is: A(94) D08 Rev C1 as the location of the planters are clearly shown on this drawing enabling an accurate assessment of where the change in height of the planters occurs. Submission for planning should include cross sections that are referenced to the site plan to enable full and proper assessment.
